6
7// Contants.h: Defines some implementation specific and gl constants
8
9#ifndef LIBANGLE_CONSTANTS_H_
10#define LIBANGLE_CONSTANTS_H_
11
12#include "common/platform.h"
13
14#include <stdint.h>
15
16namespace gl
17{
18
19// The binary cache is currently left disable by default, and the application can enable it.
20const size_t kDefaultMaxProgramCacheMemoryBytes = 0;
21
22enum
23{
24 // Implementation upper limits, real maximums depend on the hardware
25 MAX_SAMPLE_MASK_WORDS = 2,
26
27 MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBS = 16,
28 MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIB_BINDINGS = 16,
29
30 // Implementation upper limits, real maximums depend on the hardware
31 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_VARYING_VECTORS = 32,
32 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_DRAW_BUFFERS = 8,
33 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_FRAMEBUFFER_ATTACHMENTS =
34 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_DRAW_BUFFERS + 2, // 2 extra for depth and/or stencil buffers
35
36 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_VERTEX_SHADER_UNIFORM_BUFFERS = 16,
37 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_GEOMETRY_SHADER_UNIFORM_BUFFERS = 16,
38 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_FRAGMENT_SHADER_UNIFORM_BUFFERS = 16,
39 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_COMPUTE_SHADER_UNIFORM_BUFFERS = 16,
40 // GL_EXT_geometry_shader increases the minimum value of GL_MAX_COMBINED_UNIFORM_BLOCKS to 36.
41 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_COMBINED_SHADER_UNIFORM_BUFFERS = 36,
42
43 // GL_EXT_geometry_shader increases the minimum value of GL_MAX_UNIFORM_BUFFER_BINDINGS to 48.
44 // Vulkan's minimum value for maxDescriptorSetUniformBuffers is 72 so allow exposing up to that
45 // many.
46 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_UNIFORM_BUFFER_BINDINGS = 72,
47
48 // Transform feedback limits set to the minimum required by the spec.
49 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_INTERLEAVED_COMPONENTS = 128,
50 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_SEPARATE_ATTRIBS = 4,
51 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_SEPARATE_COMPONENTS = 4,
52 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_BUFFERS = 4,
53
54 // Maximum number of views which are supported by the implementation of ANGLE_multiview.
55 IMPLEMENTATION_ANGLE_MULTIVIEW_MAX_VIEWS = 4,
56
57 // These are the maximums the implementation can support
58 // The actual GL caps are limited by the device caps
59 // and should be queried from the Context
60 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_2D_TEXTURE_SIZE = 32768,
61 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_CUBE_MAP_TEXTURE_SIZE = 32768,
62 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_3D_TEXTURE_SIZE = 16384,
63 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_2D_ARRAY_TEXTURE_LAYERS = 2048,
64
65 // 1+log2 of max of MAX_*_TEXTURE_SIZE
66 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_TEXTURE_LEVELS = 16,
67
68 // Limit active textures so we can use fast bitsets.
69 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_SHADER_TEXTURES = 32,
70 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_ACTIVE_TEXTURES = IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_SHADER_TEXTURES * 2,
71 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_IMAGE_UNITS = IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_ACTIVE_TEXTURES,
72
73 // Maximum number of slots allocated for atomic counter buffers.
74 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_ATOMIC_COUNTER_BUFFERS = 8,
75
76 // Implementation upper limits, real maximums depend on the hardware.
77 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_SHADER_STORAGE_BUFFER_BINDINGS = 64,
78
79 // Implementation upper limits of max number of clip distances
80 IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_CLIP_DISTANCES = 32,
81};
82
83namespace limits
84{
85// Almost all drivers use 2048 (the minimum value) as GL_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIB_STRIDE. ANGLE advertizes
86// the same limit.
87constexpr uint32_t kMaxVertexAttribStride = 2048;
88
89// Some of the minimums required by GL, used to detect if the backend meets the minimum requirement.
90// Currently, there's no need to separate these values per spec version.
91constexpr uint32_t kMinimumComputeStorageBuffers = 4;
92
93// OpenGL ES 3.0+ Minimum Values
94// Table 6.31 MAX_VERTEX_UNIFORM_BLOCKS minimum value = 12
95// Table 6.32 MAX_FRAGMENT_UNIFORM_BLOCKS minimum value = 12
96constexpr uint32_t kMinimumShaderUniformBlocks = 12;
97// Table 6.31 MAX_VERTEX_OUTPUT_COMPONENTS minimum value = 64
98constexpr uint32_t kMinimumVertexOutputComponents = 64;
99} // namespace limits
100
101} // namespace gl
102
103#endif // LIBANGLE_CONSTANTS_H_
104
